Token.Abstract: This class provides class specific error management for an application based on values retrieved from a plist or NSDictionary. For localization support, simply localize the plist file.
Returns a singleton instance that will automatically load Errors.plist from the main bundle. If the plist doesn't exist and NSException will occur.
Initializes the singleton class with the specified plist.

Parameter.Name: urlToPlist
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to the plist to load.

Token.Abstract: Initializes the singleton class with the specified dictioanry.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to read from.

Token.Abstract: Initializer for a plist based error manager.

Parameter.Name: urlToPlist
Parameter.Abstract: The url to the plist to load.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SLErrorManager class, using a plist file as its source.

Token.Abstract: Initializer for a dictionary based error manager.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to read from.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SLErrorManager class, using a dictionary file as its source.

Token.Abstract: Registers the alert class to use for presenting errors.

Parameter.Name: alertViewClass
Parameter.Abstract: The alert class that conforms to SLAlertProtocol.

Token.Abstract: Presents a UIAlertView with the appropriate title, message and button titles.

Parameter.Name: errorCode
Parameter.Abstract: The error code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: The completion block to execute when the alert is dismissed.

Token.Abstract: Presents a UIAlertView with the appropriate title, message and button titles.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The NSError, currently we only use the error.code property from this instance.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: The completion block to execute when the alert is dismissed.

Token.Abstract: Returns the message string only for a given code/class.

Parameter.Name: code
Parameter.Abstract: The error code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Token.Abstract: Returns the message string only for a given code/class.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: We use the error to get the error-code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Token.Abstract: Gets the title and message for a given code/class.

Parameter.Name: code
Parameter.Abstract: The error-code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the title value.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the message value.

Token.Abstract: Gets the title, message and button titles for a given code/class.

Parameter.Name: code
Parameter.Abstract: The error-code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the title value.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the message value.

Parameter.Name: cancelTitle
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the cancel button title value.

Parameter.Name: otherTitles
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSArray instance, this method will set its value to an array of titles.

Token.Abstract: Gets the title, message and button titles for a given error/class.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error to use to get the error-code to lookup.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to lookup.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the title value.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the message value.

Parameter.Name: cancelTitle
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSString instance, this method will set its value to the cancel button title value.

Parameter.Name: otherTitles
Parameter.Abstract: An address to an NSArray instance, this method will set its value to an array of titles.
